repliclust.utils.sample_unit_vectors¶

repliclust.utils.sample_unit_vectors(n: int, dim: int)¶

Sample n unit vectors in dim dimensions.

nint

The number of unit vectors to sample.

dimint

The number of dimensions for each unit vector.

outndarray, shape (n, dim)

The unit vectors arranged as a matrix. Each row is a unit vector.

repliclust
